passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: Its that time of the year again , time for celebration and selecting the best possible gifts for our dear ones and friends. We all know that due to the festive season, this becomes the busiest time of the year and the management struggles to find the time and energy to organize a staff Christmas Party. This year we have decided to postpone the Christmas party until after our busy season. We apologize for the delay in celebration but we would ensure that the party will be superb and worth the wait. Any interested volunteers please contact the reception.

questions.question: Main purpose of the memo is to ?
options: ~To remind the staff to celebrate Christmas along with other festivals
=To inform staff that Christmas celebrations would be rescheduled
~To inform staff that Christmas celebrations would be cancelled this year
~To inform staff of the new year celebrations

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: We want to inform the library department to upgrade the collection of books currently available with the University. Each department head has been asked to list out the additional books in their domain and send it to chief librarian. Please check the available list with the proposed list of books and finalize books to be purchased. Submit the final list to the Accounts and admin officer for approval and purchase.

questions.question: The main purpose of this memorandum is to ?
options: ~Alert the librarian that it’s time to renew books collection
~Inform the Accounts and admin officer to purchase the books
=Guide library dept through the process of renewing their books collection
~Inform department heads to submit details of books required

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: It has been brought to our notice that all the four printer rooms are littered with waste papers ( A4 size). Most of the waste papers are taken out of the printers in order to avoid jamming . This has increased the wastage of paper in the office. This is a humble request to all employees to adjust the “Print preview” option according to the requirement before giving the command to “Print”. Kindly abstain from wasting paper and help the organization in its endeavor to support “ Go Green” movement.

questions.question: What main thought has been expressed in the above memorandum?
options: =To  guide the employees about proper printer usage
~To restrict printer usage all together
~To check how much of paper is being wasted
~To go against ‘Go Green’ movement

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: With delight we are announcing the formation of a “Cultural Club” which will aim at employee engagement activities and celebration of all National festivals. The membership for this club is free and anyone who is interested can join. The members should be ready to devote time and energy while organizing the events and ensure maximum participation from the non members. Interested candidates may approach the respective HR department and furnish required details.

questions.question: What is the above memo  about?
options: ~Banning celebrations of all cultural events in the office
=Inviting free membership for  Cultural Club formed
~HR department to allocate roles for members of club
~None of the above

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: We are all aware about the massive flood and the extensive damage caused by it . We request one and all to donate old clothes, blankets, books, toys; woollen clothes and any other article that you believe would be of use to the flood victims. All donated articles are to be stored in the boxes kept at all floors near the cafeteria and the break area. Kindly be generous and help those in need.

questions.question: What is the above memo about?
options: ~Request donation for earth quake victims
~Request donations for orphans
~Collection of old used articles for future use
=Request donation for flood victims

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: Dear Arvind,The internet usage policy of the organization has been clearly told to you when you joined the company. According to the policy you are not allowed to access any websites from any of the office computers for personal purpose. It was reported that you have been accessing personal sites such as Facebook and Gmail almost every day for the past one month. It is an act of indiscipline and disobedience towards the company’s policies and resources. You are hereby directed to explain within 24 hours from the date and time of receipt of this memo.

questions.question: Based on the above memo, which of the following statements is true?
options: ~The director is angry because Arvind is wasting his time browsing internet at office
~The director wants Arvind to stop using internet at office
=The director feels Arvind has no respect for companyâ€™s resources
~The director feels that the company policy on internet usage is incorrect

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: We have always encouraged celebrations of birthday parties and work anniversaries among teams as a means of improving the team bonding. However, there have been complaints that these celebrations are causing disturbance to other teams that are working in the premises. Therefore, it has been decided that the henceforth, the parties have to be organized only in closed conference rooms and not on the work floor. The conference rooms have to be booked in advance for the parties and proper decorum has to be maintained to see to it that there is no excessive noise and littering. No music is allowed to be played during the celebrations.

questions.question: What is the summary of the memo?
options: ~No parties are to be organized as they are causing disturbance
~Parties can be organized on floor but they cannot play music
=Parties can  be organized in conference room but no music is allowed
~Parties can be organized in conference room but other teams cannot complain

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: Your health is very important to us. We at HR department have always strived to provide you with the best policies and facilities to help you stay healthy and fit. As a continuation of these efforts, we are planning to conduct a survey to better understand some of your health concerns and programmes in which you may want to participate. This survey will be confidential so that you can be completely honest about your health needs and concerns. Based on your feedback and inputs there could be changes in the employees benefits programmes and policies to better suit your needs. We hope that each and every one of you will participate in the survey and help us improve the services.

questions.question: Why is the survey being conducted?
options: ~To find out employeesâ€™ health problems
=To improve employee benefit policies and programmes
~To make sure all employees have no health problems
~To understand their health concerns

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: It’s time for the annual sports  week we all look forward to every year. As a part of this event, we are organizing a range of games and sports competitions in the first week of June. All the employees are welcome to participate and have fun. The list of games and the dates shall be released soon. The employees who wish to participate in any game must register their names  by the end of this week. Since it is not possible to pay complete attention to work during the sports week, employees are advised to work extra time before and after the sports week to manage the work load and to ensure customer satisfaction.

questions.question: What is the main aim of the memo?
options: ~To tell the employees to work for extra hours before and after sport week.
~To inform the employees about sports week
=To ask the employees to register for the sport week.
~To welcome the employees to sports week.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: In light of the recently signed deal with XYZ company, it has been brought to our notice that your  team has performed quickly and beyond the top management’s expectations. This excellence in performance seems to be stemming from the excellent coordination and dedication among all your team members. We appreciate and recognize your team’s extraordinary role in clinching this deal. We would like to announce an additional bonus of 5% for each of your team members in recognition of their efforts and dedication. We hope your team continues to contribute to the organization in the same manner.

questions.question: Why are the team members being given the extra bonus?
options: =For their efforts and dedication
~For their role in clinching the deal
~For being a well coordinated team
~For going beyond managementâ€™s expectations

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: Rita Sen has initiated a meeting with the HR head to discuss her current employment status given that she has been on leave without pay for the past two months. As her family obligations do not allow for a fulltime return to office, Ms. Sen requested for the extension of her unpaid leave until end of next month. However, in view of  the upcoming peak work season, it has been decided that she will perform specific job tasks, on an as-needed basis, as requested by the team, from her home.  She will be paid 50% of her current salary during this period.

questions.question: What option was Ms. Sen given by the HR?
options: ~Her leave was extended as it is
=She was asked to work from home as needed by team
~Her leave request was refused and needs to work fulltime
~She works from home full time.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: A note to let everyone know that Mr. John David, who is currently working as the Operations Director in our branch would be leaving for New York on deputation at the end of this week. He will be working on a special initiative in New York for one year; post which he will resume his current position in our office. During the absence of Mr. David, his assistant Mr. Kent will be your point of contact for all your work with the operations department. You can contact Mr. Kent at Kent@xvy.com

questions.question: Why is Mr. Kent being introduced in this memo?
options: ~So that Mr. David can be relieved of his duty in this office
=So that people have a point of contact at operations department
~To let people know that Mr. David no longer works with operations department
~To let people know that operations department is operative after David leaves

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: Our head office has informed us that there will be an inspection of our office in July first week. All employees are required to be present in the office during the inspection and all assigned job tasks must be completed on time in that week. Therefore, it has been decided that all the leave applications of employees between July 1st and 7th will be cancelled. No employee can put in fresh leave application during this period. It is mandatory for all employees to work without any leave in that week. In case of any personal emergency, the HR team will take a decision on case-by-case basis.

questions.question: Why are the employees instructed to be present in office from July 1-7?
options: ~Because head office wants them all to work during that week.
~Because head office is sending inspectors to see if they are working
=Because employees must be present to finish all job tasks for inspection
~Because their leaves are cancelled for that week.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: As you all know the ABC project we are currently working on, has reached a critical stage. All of us are working overtime to complete the project on time and achieve customer satisfaction. However, it has been noticed that there has been a lag in completion of tasks over the last one week and we are unable to meet the internal project deadlines.  To arrest this situation, we are going to have team meetings everyday at 6 pm to update each other on our status on that day’s job task and assess the problems and figure out how to overcome those problems.  All the project team members are instructed to attend the meeting everyday without fail.

questions.question: Why are the project team members asked to attend the meeting?
options: =To discuss work updates
~To see to it that all employees are working
~To maintain deadlines
~To achieve customer satisfaction

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: It has come to our notice that some employees of our office are smoking in the ‘no smoking’ zones during the break hours. This is violation of rules of the office. All employees are here by instructed to use the designated smoking zones only. Any employee found smoking in a ‘no smoking’ zone will be referred to the HR for disciplinary action.  We also came to know that the current ‘smoking’ zones are not sufficient and they are getting too crowded during the break time. Therefore, we have opened another ‘smoking zone’ on the balcony of the 2nd floor of this building.

questions.question: What is the main purpose of this memo.
options: ~To instruct people to smoke in 2nd floor balcony
=To stop employees from smoking in no-smoking zones
~To tell employees about smoking area related rules
~To tell employees not to smoke.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: This is in context to “Clean Desk Policy” adopted by our organization pertaining to which at the conclusion of the work day, employees are expected to straighten their desks and put away any office-related paperwork. Papers should be filed in the appropriate cabinet or filing drawer. Sensitive material should be placed in a locked file. This policy will not be implemented in a heavy-handed manner, but employees are expected to adhere to the spirit of the policy.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the above passage ?
options: ~Encouraging employees to maintain cleanliness
=Encouraging employees to keep their desks clean
~Encouraging employees to organize their paper work
~Force the employees to adhere to â€˜clean deskâ€™ policy

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: With a heavy heart we part ways with Mr. Abc  and thank him for all the years of hard work and dedication shown towards the organization. The nice part about retiring from doing what you do so well is there is no more rushing around to meet deadlines and complete tasks. You'll have lots of time to make all your dreams come true. The bad part is how much we will miss the pleasurable experience of working with you. We wish you the all the best and thank you for your years of dedication, enthusiasm and team spirit.

questions.question: What is the chief idea expressed in the above passage?
options: ~Informing staff about Mr. ABCâ€™s retirement
=Wishing Mr. ABC and thanking him on his retirement
~Retirement is a good thing
~They donâ€™t want to work with him anymore

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:

However the remaining cafeterias will be supplied with sufficient refreshment material in order to control the rush. Also the breakfast, lunch and dinner times have been revised to : Breakfast : 7 : 30 am – 11: 30 am Lunch : 12: 00 noon – 4:00 pm Dinner : 8:00 pm – 11:00 pm. The snacks counters will be open round the clock.Thanks for your co –operation .

options: ~Because the other cafeterias are enough to control the rush
~Because lunch and dinner timing have been extended

~Because snack counters are open round the clock

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: We believe in constant and emphatic growth and this can be achieved when the employees are given opportunities to learn and get trained in respective skill sets. With this concept in mind, a Special Training Program has been planned for all the employees. The details can be obtained from the respective HR executives in each process. passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:

options: ~To celebrate Deepawali
~To decorate the conference hall
~To help interested employees

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: We need to focus advertising on internet sites that appeal to young people. According to surveys, 72% of our target market uses the internet for five hours or more per week. The following list shows in order of popularity the most frequented sites: •   Google •   Facebook •   Myspace •   EBay •   iTunes Shifting our efforts from our other media sources such as radio and magazine to these popular internet sites will more effectively promote our product sales. Young adults are spending more and more time on the internet downloading music, communicating and researching for homework and less and less time reading paper magazines and listening to the radio. As the trend for cultural icons to go digital, so must our marketing plans. Hence in order to change the advertisement angle, we invite suggestions from all employees. An “Open House” session will be organized this Friday in the Seminar Hall to further discuss on this prospectus.

questions.question: What is the main idea the passage is communicating  to the employees?
options: =Importance of online advertising and the discussion strategy with employees
~How companies are benefitting because of internet advertising
~Explaining that the target customers are using internet extensively
~To inform employees about the changes in their marketing strategy

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: All the employees are hereby informed that the submission link for Appraisal details will be activated from 19th March ’15 .  The last date of submission will be 15th April ’15 . Any submission post this defined date will not be accepted. The link for review will be open only when all submissions have been closed. The Appraisal details need to be submitted in the defined format which is already available in the common site of the organization. Any other format will not be accepted. Employees will be intimated about the dates for one – one feedback sessions with their respective managers. This will be the final step before the appraisal process is closed. All employees are requested to comply with the mentioned norms.

questions.question: What is the step before the appraisal details are closed?
options: ~Employees have to submit the appraisals
~One-one feedback dates will be announced
=One-one feedback will be conducted
~Appraisals must be submitted in the defined format

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:

In this context, the management has decided to invite known speakers on Global Warming and organize an event for awareness on this agenda.The details of the event are as follows: Inauguration of the event by Lamp lighting Speech by the invited dignitaries Thank You speech by the MD Open House session for the audience Date of the event : 17th April ‘15 Venue : The Auditorium Timing : 4:00 pm – 8:00 pm  All are invited to participate.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the above passage?

~Telling the employees that global warming is harmful
~Informing employees about the organisationâ€™s concern in global warming

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:

In this context the management has decided to organize a Marathon race to highlight the importance of “ Go Green” initiative already taken by the organization. Interested participants need to assemble in the Cafeteria today at 4:00 pm where the details of the race will be informed along with the other related requisites.

~Social responsibility

~Corporate citizenship

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: As per the provision of Section 192 of the Income Tax Act 1961, person responsible for paying any income chargeable under the head Salaries shall, at the time of payment, deduct income-tax on the amount payable at the average rate of Income Tax computed on the basis of the rates in force for the Financial Year in which the payment is made, on the estimated income of the assesses under the head ‘Salaries “after allowing the permissible deductions. To avoid any excess deduction of Income Tax, all employees are directed to submit anticipated Savings eligible for deductions against salary income on prescribed format during the Financial Year 2015-2016 by 25-10-2015 positively with Accounts Branch. Thanks in advance.

questions.question: Why should all employees supply with the mentioned details as specified in the above passage?
options: ~Because it is mentioned in the Income Tax Act
=To avoid deduction of excess tax
~To increase the income
~Because Accounts Branch wants it

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
In order to successfully launch a product, it is essential for the Marketing division, Manufacturing division and Strategic planning division to meet before the launch. Hence, in this context a meeting has been called for inviting representatives from all the mentioned divisions. The meeting will be presided by the Chairman of the company.
The details of the meeting are:
Date: 10th April ‘15
Venue: Conference Hall.
Attendance is mandatory.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
Our company has always outlived the expectations of the client and we have carved a niche for ourselves in this competitive market. The details of the meeting are as mentioned below :
Date : 22nd Apr ‘15
Venue : The Conference Hall
Time : 10:00 am – 5:00 pm
Note : Attendance is mandatory and innovative ideas are welcome. The Management will feel happy to welcome any such idea.

~Meeting details
=Meeting for reviewing the performance so far and the relevant details

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: It has come to the notice of the Safety Department that several fire exit doors are not functioning properly. This was highlighted during one of the routine check – up rounds conducted by the same team. Hence they will be repaired with immediate effect and in view of that the employees might face inconvenience especially in floors 6 and 7.  We sincerely apologize and would appreciate co –operation from all. The repair work will be completed as soon as possible to ensure hassle free work environment.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the above passage?
options: ~Some of the doors were not functioning properly
~The problem is not for all employees
=The passage requests co operation from all employees while the repair work is being done.
~The passage warns the employees not to use the doors

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:

The activity will start from today and will continue till tomorrow noon. Kindly co –operate and bear with us. This is being done to ensure smooth functioning of all systems with greater capacity.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
In order to protect the sensitive information of the company while using the information technology, all the departments are hereby advised to follow the guidelines given below:• firewalls on all systems must be upgraded every two weeks
• do not share passwords with employees outside your department
• encrypt all information classified as sensitive
• Director’s approval is required to share any sensitive information online
• The login passwords for the systems must be changes every 90 days We intent to work closely with all the department heads to ensure that these guidelines are strictly being adhered to. A checklist of all the guidelines with required details is available with the IT department. Feel free to write to us if you would like to have a copy of the checklist.

questions.question: what is the main idea discussed in the passage?
options: ~Importance of information security
=Guideline to be followed for information security
~Information on where to find information security checklist
~Information that IT department will help implementation of information security

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: The management of the JJ super markets would like to remind the employees that the parking space in front of the stores is meant for customers only. There is limited parking space available in front of most of the stores. We request you to leave this space for customers so as not to cause inconvenience. We are aware that it may cause some inconvenience to our employees, but it makes our business more accessible to customers. The employees may use the paid parking available 2 blocks away. The store will bear the parking costs for the employees.

questions.question: why is the management asking the employees not to park their vehicles in front of the store?
options: ~Because they have to use paid parking only
~Because the company is paying for their parking else where
=So that the parking space in front of the store can be used by customers
~So that customers can leave the store easily

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
Instances have come to the notice that some of employees of ABC International have made it a regular practice to arrive office late. The timings of login are not strictly adhered to and later on when questioned, the employee state “official duty” as the reason for coming late. It has also been found that some of the employees come late, login only and then straightaway leave the office without visiting their respective section. This pattern of attendance is unacceptable.
The management has decided to take strict course of action against the employees who are regular in late coming. Late attendance login by 5 minutes for a maximum of three times in a calendar month shall be allowed, after which for every three late marks, one day salary will be deducted. Only two short leaves of 2 hours duration will be allowed in a month. Also a prior notification is must before you take any leave. Employees failing to adhere with the norms have to face serious disciplinary actions.

questions.question: what is the main idea of this passage?
options: =Restricting the employees from coming late to office
~Penalizing the employees for coming late
~Saving money by penalizing employees for coming late
~Streamlining the leave procedure

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
This is in reference to the seven days holidays that you have taken without any prior notice. You are reporting in the office after 7 days. This kind of irresponsible behavior is highly condemnable. Any kind of holiday that is taken without prior permission is not considered as a leave. Moreover it is considered as a willful negligence of duties.
Being absent from duties without prior consent is against the companies HR policies and demands immediate actions. The senior management had a meeting regarding this matter and had decided to consider this as first and last time mistake. In case it is repeated, serious actions would be taken.

questions.question: what is the main idea of this memo?
options: ~Encouraging the employee to follow the leave application procedure
=Warning the employee not to take long leaves without prior permission
~Listing out the HR policies on leave application
~Bringing discipline among office employees

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: I am writing to reaffirm our commitment to maintaining a university environment free of the abuse of alcohol and other drugs. Our university recognizes and affirms the value of personal responsibility and accountability. Because of this, we are committed to having a university that is free from the abuse of alcohol or involvement in other drugs (except as prescribed by a physician or licensed medical personnel). The university is dedicated to creating and fostering an atmosphere conducive to the well being and personal development of each of its students, faculty, and staff. The unlawful manufacture, distribution, dispensation, possession, or involvement with alcohol and illegal drugs by faculty, staff, or students in the workplace, on university property, or as part of any university activity is prohibited. A violation of any of the above prohibitions will result in disciplinary action, which may include expulsion or termination

questions.question: what is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: =ensuring the university environment is free of drug and alcohol abuse
~implicating students and faculty in drug and alcohol abuse
~informing students and faculty about drug and alcohol abuse
~clarifying that university is not responsible for drug and alcohol abuse by students

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: In Order to equip ourselves to face the current economic downturn, the company has decided to cut down on the employee's official  travel expenses. The limit on travel expenses of employees in L1 band has been revised to Rs. 1,50,000 from the previous Rs. 200,000 per trip. The travel expenses for L2 band employees has been brought down to Rs. 50,00 per trip. If the employees exceed the limit mentioned herewith, the company shall not reimburse the excess amount. We are aware that this cost cutting may cause some inconvenience to some of our employees, however, it is necessary to reduce our costs to survive in these difficult times. We thank our employees for their understanding and cooperation.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~letting the employees know that their travel is restricted
~cutting travel expenses force the employees to travel less and work more
=cutting travel expenses to face economic recession
~cutting travel expenses to increase company profits

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: Did you know that about 70% of the trash from an office like ours is paper, which can be recycled? our recycling efforts are important because we are responsible for protecting our environment.  It also helps in reducing our waste disposal expenses. With this in mind, we are implementing a new recycling program in our office. We encourage you to actively participate on our recycling efforts. we will be placing separate containers for recyclable and non-recyclable material. A list of office waste material categorised in to recyclable and non-recyclable  is attached to this email. We request you to dispose the office waste into appropriate containers by referring to this list. With everyone’s participation,. we are sure we can contribute to the Swach Bharat movement.

questions.question: According to the passage, how can the employees contribute to Swach Bharat movement?
options: ~by cleaning their offices
=by disposing the waste properly into recyclable and non recyclable containers
~by identifying recyclable waste and recycling it
~by protecting the environment by saving paper

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: S&T Company is happy by seeing the level of support its employees have shown toward assisting others. Whether on a private volunteer level or through the company giving program, our employees play a vital and contributing factor in helping our community. S&T Company is supporting Education of underprivileged children. By giving a donation of above Rs. 200, you get a free lunch coupon for our office cafeteria, as a gesture of our appreciation. You may make the payment either by directing the HR to deduct the amount from your monthly salary, or by directly paying cash at the accounts department. Let’s keep our great record of helping our community. Thanks for your contribution.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~it is about how to get a free lunch coupon for cafeteria
~it says that the company supports only education related charity
=the company is encouraging the employees to contribute to the charity
~the company is appreciating employees for their voluntary work

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage: This is the last minute notification to all the employees for an emergency meeting that is going to be held today itself after office hours. The time of the meeting is from 7:00pm to 8:30pm. The meeting will be held in Sapphire conference and will start sharp at 7:00pm. So please make sure to reach the conference hall before 10 minutes for a hassle free sitting arrangement. It is compulsory for all the people to attend the meeting. No excuses will be entertained at any cost. The purpose of the meeting is the sudden technical error that we are facing in the production plant which is affecting all the departments of the organization. All the seniors and supervisors are requested to prepare a contingency plan to deal with the coming problem and come up with the short presentations. I know the time is less but as you know we have done it before and we can do it again! Make sure to switch off your mobiles before the meeting.

questions.question: What kind of short presentations are seniors and supervisors expected to come up with?
options: ~presentation about the emergency meeting
~presentation explaining the technical error affecting the production plant
~presentation about their production strategy
=presentation about their contingency plan to face the technical error

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
It has been observed of late that most of the employees are not reporting to office on time. This is a direct violation of work ethics and this organization believes in maintaining strict discipline regarding office hours.
All employees are hereby directed to follow the designated office timings diligently . Henceforth an attendance register will be kept at the entrance near the biomatrix and all employees are directed to manually enter the in and out timings on a regular basis. Thanks for your co -operation.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~Announcement of incentive plan.
~Announcement of Insurance benefits for the employees.
=Directive regarding a new rule for maintaining strict discipline regarding late coming.
~Announcement of new holiday list.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
Dear Members,
With pleasure we announce the details of the much awaited annual event Dinner and Dance ( D& D) party that will be organized like we have been doing every year.
The relevant details are :
Venue : The Golf Park
Date : 30th May ‘15
Timings : 7:00 pm onwards.
The invitation cards and the passes will be sent on mail , all employees are requested to get a print out of same on the day of the event. The dress code is formal and two family members have been permitted for each employee.
Also kindly note that keeping in mind the recent recession, we have decided to tone down the flavour of the event though the grandeur will not be impacted significantly. We know with what eagerness all employees wait for this event every year and we hope to keep the spirits high irrespective of the situation.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~It is about an amusement party
=it is about the annual event of the company
~It is about a health camp
~It is about a friendly cricket match

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
Dear Sports Enthusiasts,
Its a pleasure to inform you all that our company will be taking part in the Business Sports League organized by the conglomeration of Business Houses.
The event will be for five (5) days starting with Indoor Soccer Competition.
We hereby invite interested candidates to submit their nomination for the team to the Selection Committee by tomorrow ( 29th May ‘15) evening, 5 pm sharp.
Just Names, Designation and current Reporting Manager details are required.
Looking forward to this exciting event

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~This passage is about a blood donation camp.
=This passage is an invite to interested candidates  for a soccer match.
~This passage is an announcement about the annual dance party
~This passage is about a change in company policy.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
In the view of the recent flu epidemic, the company has decided to organize a Free Health Check up camp for all its employees.The company understands the importance of keeping our staff healthy and has engaged SingHealth to organise a free health checkup for all staff.
The details regarding the camp are :
Date : 1st June ‘15
Venue : The Community Hall
Time : 10:00 am - 2:00 pm.
The complete health checkup package consists of:
• blood test
• blood pressure examination
• stress evaluation
• posture examination
• chiropractors consultation
• H1N1 vaccination
All fees are paid for by the company and you are encouraged to take advantage of this opportunity. Please contact HR executive at ext. 648 if you are interested.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~It is about a relief camp
~It is about the renovation of the cafeteria
=It is about a free health check up camp and the details about the benefits
~It is about a free eye checkup camp.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
The last couple of years have been dynamic for our company which has lead to growth and expansion not only of the brand that we signify , but also to the manpower count. In this context we invite our existing employees for references in order to fulfill the manpower requirement for the projects that we have/ are in the process of acquiring.
The Job description alongwith the candidate profile will be available with the HR . Interested employees may get in touch and do the needful.
Please note : For each reference , the employee will be entitled to a remuneration the details of which are also available with the HR.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~It is an invitation
=It is a request made to the existing employees for references ( new job openings)
~It is a declaration of the company assets
~It is an exaltation regarding the growth of the company.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
Dear All,
Please note that there has been a change in the vacation policy. Employees wishing to take vacation days during the summer months of July and August must submit request forms by June 18. Employees who do not submit their requests in writing will not be permitted to take vacation until September.All requests are to be submitted through the official online portal or via e mail to the HR.
Kindly adhere to the above mentioned policy.
Thanks for your co-operation.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: =It is regarding a change in one of the company’s vacation policy.
~It is regarding a change in the employee engagement fund policy
~It is regarding the change in office timings
~It is regarding a change in the office facility

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
It has been 6 months that the New benefit Plan has been launched and we hope that employees have been able to take advantage of this new plan.
Please be advised that as of March 31, 2016 an additional 3% will be deducted from part-time employees’ pay. This is to offset the costs of the new benefits plan. Employees will see changes to their pay on the April 8 payroll.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: =An additional information about a new benefit plan has been shared in the above passage.
~The salary has been revised for all employees.
~The part time employees have been made regular employees.
~The passage talks about a new salary increment scheme.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
The automotive service department has included certain innovative concepts that would enhance the existing software currently implemented and in that context this department will offer training on VH-2 diagnostic software on June 14-15, 2015. While not compulsory, staff are encouraged to attend the training. The training will be for 5 days from 9:00 am - 5:00 pm.
For further information or to register, contact the HR in the office by June 1st.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: ~About the recent development in the automotive department
=About a special training to be conducted by the automotive department
~About a new addition to the existing team in the automotive department.
~About expansion in the automotive department.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
It has come to the attention of the administration that attendance at monthly sales meetings has been lower than expected in recent months. We started these meetings to make communication and information sharing easier. We understand that the travel requirements may make these meetings difficult; therefore, meetings will now be held via video conferencing.
Each sales staff member will receive all the equipment required to participate in the new meeting format. Meetings will continue to take place on the last Thursday of each month.
For assistance with the new technology please contact the respective training coordinator, at least one week before the next

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: =The passage is about the changed format of the monthly sales meeting
~The passage talks about the sales targets
~The passage talks about new sales strategies to be implemented
~The passage talks about new recruitment sales team.

passageArray.note: Read the following passage and answer the question given below:
passageArray.passage:
This is to inform all staff of the childcare centre on the 3rd floor that the building will be undergoing renovations between June 17 and 20, 2015. During that time, employees are asked to avoid the main lobby area. Elevators will remain in service; however, please expect some interruption in service due to electrical work.
Thank you for your co- operation and we regret any inconvenience.

questions.question: What is the main idea expressed in the passage?
options: =This passage informs the employees of a particular division about renovation details.
